Name: 1_today_commissioner_citypolice_city
Representative_Docs:
['#PHPollard & #PHGilbert drew in quite a crowd when on patrol today. Giving officers a great opportunity to offer crime prevention advice and raise #ProjectServator awareness. As well as answering lots of questions about the Mounted Police Role. @cityoflondon @CityPolice  651cp https://t.co/l5NmI6sJo3', "#ProjectServator officers from the Met, @BTP & @CityPolice  carried out a joint op around central London - even taking their patrol onto a @thamesclippers 
These patrols take place across the capital, & are one way we are helping to keep London safe.
Together we've got it covered https://t.co/KMoZTsYHWR", "I was delighted to visit @metpoliceuk's operation centre & Great Scotland Yard ahead of the Coronation.

I thanked officers & new recruits who will be on duty this weekend, working tirelessly to keep the public safe. 

Wilbur the horse is ready to lead the coronation procession! https://t.co/JxMAp8vmU6"]

Name: 4_control_command_met_need
Representative_Docs: ['Met Command and Control (@MetCC) communications officers are the first point of contact should you need police support. Name: 5_jailed_man_charged_murder
Representative_Docs:
['#JAILED | Two men have been jailed for murder following the fatal stabbing of 16-year-old Alex Smith in 2019

Detectives worked closely with colleagues @NCA_UK who helped to locate the men in Kenya before they were extradited to the UK

Read more here: https://t.co/oJfvNWxYZm', "#UPDATE | Officers investigating the murder of a man outside a nightclub in #Ilford have charged a second man with his murder. 

The 29-year-old was arrested at Heathrow Airport yesterday. He is due to appear at Uxbridge Magistrates' Court. 

https://t.co/eicu6XIbe1", 'A man responsible for a Â£20.5 million investment scam has been jailed.

Joseph Lewis was sentenced to 5 years and 4 months in prison at Southwark Crown Court last week after pleading guilty to 19 counts of fraud by false representation. 

https://t.co/sH5Qp8yrix https://t.co/DMcdy2rgGi']

Name: 6_101_appeal_quoting_witnesses
Representative_Docs:
['A murder investigation is under way after a 21-yr-old man died following a stabbing in #Downham.

The incident happened in Bromley Rd at 23:50hrs on Fri 4 Nov.

Were you in the area? Did you see anything?

Pls call 101 quote ref 8645/4Nov with info.

https://t.co/EsDeLDkxk7', '#APPEAL | We are appealing for witnesses and dash cam footage after a pedestrian died following a collision in #Tottenham.

A 36-year-old woman was arrested at the scene in Watermead Way on Sunday, 18 July.

ğŸ“ 101 or tweet @MetCC quoting CAD 507/18Jul.

https://t.co/I65aYSggj6', '#APPEAL | We are appealing for witnesses after a 19-year-old man was seriously injured in a stabbing in #Woolwich on Sunday. 

â˜ï¸ Any witnesses are asked to call 101 quoting CAD 10/26Feb or contact @CrimestoppersUK anonymously.  

https://t.co/OlwSIGwyYj']

Name: 9_valuables_surroundings_sight_watches
Representative_Docs:
["Key things you can do to help protect yourself from street robbery are:
- Stay aware of your surroundings & pay attention to who's around you
- Keep valuables such as mobiles, watches & cash out of sight 
- Plan your route home

For further advice visit: https://t.co/aevHZgjV64 https://t.co/2Z5W0K3PTI", "Key things you can do to help protect yourself from street robbery are:
